text: All areas of square W-576 and reservations 12 and 6B disturbed by reason of operations under this subchapter shall, except as otherwise provided in this subchapter, be restored to their original condition to the satisfaction of the Architect of the Capitol.

title.text: Parks, Public Buildings, Grounds, and Space. (Refs & Annos)

subchapter.text: Capitol Grounds and Botanic Garden Tunnel.

heading.catch_text: Tunnel under Capitol Grounds and Botanic Garden grounds-- Restoration of grounds to original condition.
